description.p: Get the date value NrOfMonths months ahead of Date.

prototypes.prototype: AddMonthsToDate as D (Date as D, NrOfMonths as N)

discussion.p: The AddMonthsToDate function computes a new date by adding months to a date field.

example.caption: AddMonthsToDate() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDate() AS Now, AddMonthsToDate(CurrentDate(), 4) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:00:00 00 am|02/10/2020 12:00:00 00 am
